userstory_desc_format:
As a [user role], 
 I want [goal/desire],
 so that [benefit/value]. 
 Acceptance Criterias: <list out the criterias> 
 Additional information, constraints, or dependencies. Define the boundaries of the story and provide clear guidelines for testing. Use bullet points for clarity.
testcase_desc_format: Include Preconditions if any. Detailed Test Steps in table format with columns Step number, Step and Expected Result. Include Postconditions if any.
